fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: PEPP, Capital Markets Union, IDD, MiFID, CRD, MiFir, all regulation relating to the Financial sector/Financial services.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: We take actively part in the work at a national level on all issues in relation to regulation of the financial sector. However, we are particularly interested in the PEPP and would like to take part in the development and discussions at the European level on this matter.
goals__remit: The largest provider of pillar II pensions in the Danish market. The Group consists of PFA Holding, PFA Pension, PFA Asset Management, PFA Bank, PFA Alternative Investment Fund and a number of real estate funds.
